title: Intend to move away from conventional vehicles, focus on NEVs: JSW MG Motor Director Parth Jindal
description: JSW MG Motor India is shifting focus to new energy vehicles, launching the electric crossover 'MG Windsor'. The company aims for over 50% of its sales to come from electric vehicles by 2024. Currently, EVs account for 35% of sales. The Windsor features a 38 kWh battery with a range of 331 kms and will be available from October.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
